Synopsis: List GPG keys for a given user or the authenticated user
Description: Lists a given user's or the current user's GPG keys.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-GitHubUserGpgKey
Gets all GPG keys for the authenticated user.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-GitHubUserGpgKey -ID '1234567'
Gets the GPG key with ID '1234567' for the authenticated user.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 3
Examples.Code:
Get-GitHubUserGpgKey -Username 'octocat'
Gets all GPG keys for the 'octocat' user.
